system.description: You channel positive energy to cure 4d8 points of damage +1 point per caster level (maximum +40) in each selected creature. Like other cure spells, mass cure critical wounds deals damage to undead in its area rather than curing them. Each affected undead may attempt a Will save for half damage.
system.target: One creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
system.savingThrow: Will half (harmless) or Will half; see text
